item.description: Ok - I wasn't really feeling the class, and 8 of 8 people who have taken my poll wanted to do Shoppers - so let's do it! They have a pretty decent menu (great sweet potato fries!) and some good beers on tap. It can get a little crowded, and we aren't guaranteed a table, especially if we get there late. Let's shoot for 8PM.
item.name: Drinkin' at Shoppers Cafe
